title: Crash of loading into the game, and demote, lose two games!!!
body: hi, after this update. I can't to load into the game after champion selection. It keeps crash and the system judge me to lose two games. I'm now demoted!! Does it happen on anyone else?

replies.body:
Hey there,

When you experience this crash do you receive an error message of any sort or is the game just crashing to desktop?
